sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../style/MarketSummary.css'; const marketData = [ { name: 'VN-INDEX', value: '1,283.26 (15.96 1.26%)', shares: '895,786,314 Cổ phần', volume: '21,396.060 Tỷ', status: 'Chờ nhận lệnh', }, { name: 'VN30', value: '1,372.04', change: '(19.79 1.46%)', color: 'green', shares: '482,264,152', volume: '13,283.441 Tỷ', status: 'Chờ nhận lệnh', stats: { up: 150, upWarn: 3, unchange: 40, down: 90, downWarn: 1 }, }, { name: 'VNXALL', value: '0', change: '(0/0%)', color: 'white', shares: '905,524,492', volume: '0 Tỷ', status: 'Chờ nhận lệnh', stats: { up: 0, upWarn: 0, unchange: 0, down: 0, downWarn: 0 }, }, { name: 'HNX-INDEX', value: '216.04', change: '(1.91 0.89%)', color: 'green', shares: '56,598,636', volume: '2,596.220 Tỷ', status: 'Chờ nhận lệnh', stats: { up: 104, upWarn: 6, unchange: 14, down: 76, downWarn: 4 }, }, { name: 'HNX-UPCOMINDEX', value: '93.59', change: '(0.19 0.20%)', color: 'green', shares: '46,870,777', volume: '1,509.460 Tỷ', status: 'Chờ nhận lệnh', stats: { up: 72, upWarn: 3, unchange: 11, down: 49, downWarn: 2 }, }, ]; function MarketSummary() { return (
{marketData.map((item) => (
{/* Dòng 1 */}
{item.name}
{item.change}
{/* Dòng 2 */}
{item.shares} Cổ phần
{item.change}
{/* Dòng 3 */}
▲ {item.stats.up} ⚠ {item.stats.upWarn} ▬ {item.stats.unchange} ▼ {item.stats.down} ⚠ {item.stats.downWarn}
{item.status}
))}
); } export default MarketSummary;
